mapper.sql: select u.user_name, u.nick_name, c.course_id, c.course_name, c.user_name as teacher_id, c.start_time, c.finish_time, c.credit, s.score_id, s.score from sys_user u inner join ssms_score_course_user scu on u.user_name = scu.user_name inner join ssms_course c on c.course_id = scu.course_id inner join ssms_score s on s.score_id = scu.score_id

select count(c.course_id) as course_count, avg(s.score) as score_avg, max(s.score) as score_max, min(s.score) as score_min from sys_user u inner join ssms_score_course_user scu on u.user_name = scu.user_name inner join ssms_course c on c.course_id = scu.course_id inner join ssms_score s on s.score_id = scu.score_id
mapper.select: select c.course_name as courseName, avg(s.score) as score, c.start_time as startTime, c.finish_time as finishTime from sys_user u inner join ssms_score_course_user scu on u.user_name = scu.user_name inner join ssms_course c on c.course_id = scu.course_id inner join ssms_score s on s.score_id = scu.score_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
